snippet: The dismissals came two days after New York officials reported that a mechanic overrode a safety system before an executive, Suzanne Hart, was crushed to death on Dec. 14.
abstract: Transel Elevator, which serviced an elevator in a Midtown Manhattan office tower shortly before a malfunction killed advertising executive Suzanne Hart, announces that it has fired five mechanics who were on duty that day; move comes two days after city officials report results of an investigation revealing that a mechanic overrode an important safety system a short time before Hart's death.
lead_paragraph: The dismissals came two days after New York officials reported that a mechanic overrode a safety system before an executive, Suzanne Hart, was crushed to death on Dec. 14.

headline.seo: 5 Fired After Report on Elevator Death
headline.main: 5 Fired After Report on Elevator Death
headline.print_headline: 5 Fired After Report on Elevator Death
